term.title: supersaturation

item.text: In chemistry, an unstable system which has a greater concentration of a material in solution than would exist at equilibrium is said to be supersaturated.

In meteorology, supersaturation of an air mass with respect to H2O vapour is of special interest. It is the saturation ratio minus one, or the percent supersaturation is the percentrelative humidity minus 100.
